body.name: OLIXIS Cross Legged Armless Adjustable Swivel Padded Home Office Desk Chair No Wheels, Silver

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Wider Seat Width】If you like to maintain correct sitting posture and sit cross-legged occasionally, this is the desk chair for you! The 26’’ seat width and 18.7’’ seat depth will provide you with more room and comfort.

【Comfortable Padded Seat】Seat cushion and backrest filled with high-density sponge, combined with ergonomic structure, this cross legged office chair is more suitable for sedentary people. Upgraded PU leather is durable and comfortable. Elegant look to accent any style of space.

【Height Adjustable】The height of this desk chair no wheels is adjustable, enabling it to match most tables. The adjusting height range from the seat cushion to the floor is 15.94’’ - 19.69’’, which is suitable for teenagers, adults, and seniors.

【Swivel & Locking】 The seat of this armless desk chair can be rotated 360°, creating a more convenient home office for you and saving space. After turning the knob under the seat cushion and pulling out the lever, the seat can be swung back at 21°, which is suitable for reading, watching TV, playing games, and other leisure time.

【Sturdy】The SGS-certified gas spring and the metal base of the cross structure are very sturdy and can bear up to 300 lbs. The bottom of the home office chair feet is designed with a rubber bottom, which is non-slip and scratch-resistant.
body.description: The Armless Home Office Chair with Padded Backrest And Adjustable Height Specification: Overall Height:30.71"-34.45" Seat Height:15.94"-19.69’’ Seat Depth:18.7" Back Height: 13.78" Back Width: 25.2" Wider Comfort Featuring 25.2’’ seat width and 18.7’’ seat depth, the lobby fits for people of all statures, offering larger space. Just enjoy any sitting position as you like without extra pressure. Multiple Adjustment The height of this armless office room chair is adjustable to ensure that you find a good seated position. Meanwhile, turn the knob under the seat cushion and pull out the lever, the seat can swing back at 21°. Comfortable Features This armless desk chair with a 360°swivel enables you to reach and move between different areas around you. It allows you to sit comfortably in a suitable position to improve your posture and overall health while working. Unrivaled Quality Only using high quality materials and safe mechanical structures when in design and construction. Upgraded PU leather is durable and comfortable. Elegant look to accent any style of space. Definitely add an elegant feeling when creating a cozy place for you in working. Stylish Appearance Different from traditional office chairs, this cross-legged lobby's modern structural design and skin-friendly fabric appearance can make the space more dynamic and special, perfect for home office, living room, conference rooms, study,etc. Sales Service: We believe in our products. That's why we offer 12-month insurance on all of our products and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support. Notes: We strongly recommend reading the user manual before starting to assemble the product. What's in the Box? 1 Armless Office Chair 1 Set of Assembling Tools 1 User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really fun buy!
reviews.reviewText: I went back-and-forth on this chair. I was concerned about the quality because I saw reviews that said holes didn’t match up, but then I saw a reviewer with the solution. She said to just put the top two screws of the chair back in enough to hold it in place and that would align the bottom two. But aside from that small quirk, which wasn’t a big deal, putting the chair together was SO EASY!! There was literally just four diagrams. It took me 15 minutes tops. The chair is so cool. BIGGG, comfy and sturdy with super durable material. I absolutely love it!! I’m glad I finally got one. For the price point it’s amazing and it arrived a week ahead of schedule.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft oversized chair!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality chair! Only took 5 mins to set up and can be raised or lowered to different heights. It also reclines a bit, which is really nice. The seat is extra wide and the material is very soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute & perfect for the short girlies
reviews.reviewText: As someone who is barely 5 feet tall, I have always struggled with desk chairs and not being able to reach the floor, and therefore not be comfortable.As a short girly, I tend to just sit criss-cross applesauce no matter where I am - home, car, or office lol. So this viral chair was an instant buy as it has plenty of room to spread out! I love that it doesn't have arm rests as those usually didn't line up with my height either (even the adjustable ones).The fabric is beautiful and feels high quality. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the fabric seems to not be super taught on the seat cushion, so it wrinkles and moves around a bit, which makes it look cheap.Otherwise, great value and style with comfort!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy office chair
reviews.reviewText: The chair needs two people to put together, but it was fairly straightforward. The chair feels high quality, not cheap at all. The wideness is great and it’s perfect to sit with crossed legs. Would recommend for wfh people!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: My chair arrived yesterday. It’s nice quality for the price. It feels solid and is comfortable. Slight chemical smell that dissipated overnight.No problems putting it together. My 17 y/o son had it assembled inside of 10 minutes.I’ve been working while sitting on the chair for the past two hours. I am 5 ft 4, and the chair offers great lumbar support for someone with my proportions. I’m finding it much easier to maintain good posture at my desk than on my roller chair with arms/high back (standard office desk chair).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super wide comfort
reviews.reviewText: This chair took all of 5 minutes to put together and it is sturdy. I was a bit hesitant about the sheer width of the chair but having used it for a couple days now I can say that it’s quite comfortable. Nice, thick padding. Swivels and tilts and does the things you’d want a chair to do. For the price it feels like a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love with this chair. It’s extremely comfy and I can sit for long periods of time without any back pain. It’s easy to move around despite having no wheels. I have a plastic chair mat under my desk and it slides across it easily when I need to move it out of the way. I love the height of this chair as well. I am 4’11 and most chairs even at their lowest setting my feet don’t fully reach the floor comfortably. Usually my legs are leaned forward or on my toes a bit. However this chair at its lowest setting I can perfectly reach the floor and knees are at the comfiest 90 degree angle.SETUP: The chair was fairly easy to put together. Thankfully I read the reviews or I would’ve been extremely frustrated. The instructions for this are literally 4 steps that make it seem super easy. It is but not because of the instructions. Another reviewer left a video review and said it’s easier to put together if you swap steps 4 and 3 so you can line up the holes on the back with the bottom easier. This is 100% true so thanks for that reviewer!!! I’ll add on - you have to put the back and bottom together at kind of a weird angle to get the holes to line up and start with the back holes first! I can’t even really describe the angle but it feels really wrong. Almost like a wider angle than you think it should ever go. The back of the chair isn’t a 90 degree angle it tilts back a bit. If you can find the angle you’ll get the screws in with very little issue. I put this together by myself in about 5 minutes and 4 of those minutes were figuring out the angle for the back of the chair.CONS: I only have one con really. It’s the angle of the back of the chair. It’s tilted back just a tad too much for me. I like to be able to sit back in my chair and lean into the back but with this one if I do that I can’t type very well. I think if I add a lumbar support pillow I can lean back comfortably. To me, it’s not a huge deal because of the overall comfort and price of this chair. But something worth mentioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WIDTH IS AMAZING life changing chair
reviews.reviewText: I’m 6’0” and 250lb. The width of this baby is unparalleled. Minor hiccups during install because of user error but it was only a few steps and fairly simple. It’s very firm and comfy - if you like leaning back, the up/down level also controls the recline. Took me a bit to figure that out lol. I would buy another in a heartbeat just for the width and the fact that I can sit comfortably on it while working. Thrilled. Also I swapped the wheels out from my old chair.

I bought this chair for my home office and it’s delightful. It’s comfortable, I can sit however I please to my cross-legged content, and it’s sturdy. The back rest adjuster is a little stubborn but once set it stays. Assembled easily.
Erg comfortabele en stevige stoel, helemaal zoals verwacht.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfy chair but the tilt mechanism stopped working after a week
reviews.reviewText: Just got my chair a week or so ago it’s it’s very comfy and easy to put together - but the tilt mechanism has stopped working all of a sudden and I can’t see a way to fix it. Dissapointing as it seemed so good otherwise
